text: KLVI (560 AM, "News Talk 560") is a news-talk radio station in the Beaumont, Texas, metropolitan area. It is currently owned by iHeartMedia, Inc.. Its studios are located southeast of the I-10/US 69 interchange in Beaumont, and its transmitter is located in Bridge City, Texas. The station was assigned the KLVI call letters by the Federal Communications Commission in February 1964. Before this switch the station was known as KFDM. ==References== ==External links== *KLVI NewsTalk 560 official website Category:News and talk radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 1924 LVI Category:IHeartMedia radio stations
